about_the_game:
Blade Of Ten
A 3rd Person Fighting Adventure Game where you play as a Fragment Keeper trying to unfold the mysteries of a unsettling circumstances that threatens humankind. In your path, you will come across many dangerous foes, including monsters, demons, aliens, robots, and more!

Gameplay
A 3rd Person adventure game where you embark on quests, fight against against a variety of enemies, buy weapons and equipment, craft upgrades and level up spells and perks to aid you in your endeavors.

The World
Your adventures span across a variety of different worlds and areas, including secluded islands, snowy mountains, alien planets, the depths of the underworld and more!

Characters
There are many characters with extensive backstories in the world of Blade Of Ten. You can often hear what they have to say in game, unless they are hostile, in which case you will hear them coming at you with full force!

Go Kart Mode
Challenge your greatest rivals and foes to a go kart race. Unlock new characters by completing achievements in Story mode and show them who the fastest driver in the Blade Of Ten is. Even evil creatures from the deep abyss need to have fun sometimes!

Story
The Blade Of Ten is a Sword of Unfathomable Power, forged by Ten Legendary Blacksmiths to fend off the forces of evil. It corrupted all who yielded it with the temptation of power, so it was dismantled into fragments.
Fragment Keepers are trained from a young age to watch over and protect the fragments so that they may never fall into the wrong hands.
One day, disaster strikes and the fragments are lost.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains fights where the player must defeat enemies often. The main character appears shirtless and wearing shorts when no items are equipped. Some characters may have somewhat revealing clothing.
